description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. The classic Fifteen puzzle game in 3D with additional features such as a built-in Paint Studio and the possibility of importing your and your friends gamerpictures!
description.short: The classic Fifteen puzzle game in 3D with additional features such as a built-in Paint Studio and the possibility of importing your and your friends gamerpictures!
